Name: Phantom Hunter
About the game: Enter the supernatural world of the Phantom Hunter - a bullet hell platformer that will put your skills to the test! Dodge deadly attacks, explore hidden treasures, and unlock powerful upgrades as you exterminate ghosts in this 8-bit adventure. Are you ready to become the ultimate ghost hunter?
